comments.comments_text: OWN GOAL! Fabio Depaoli (Benevento) scores an unlucky own goal after he deflected a shot which went into his own net! 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Sergej Milinkovic-Savic plays in Ciro Immobile (Lazio), who shows great determination to get to the ball before a couple of defenders and from inside the box he shoots into the left side of the net! Great finish - 2:0.
